name: af-pfa-calculator
description: Calculate your Air Force Physical Fitness Asssessment scores. NOT to be used for the Air Force Academy Candidate Fitness Assessment.

scripts.test:cov: nyc instrument test/ instrumented-test/ && nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-lcov --reporter=html mocha instrumented-test/*  && rm -rf instrumented-test/ coverage/ .nyc_output
scripts.coverage: nyc instrument test/ instrumented-test/ && nyc --reporter=text-lcov mocha instrumented-test/* | coveralls && rm -rf instrumented-test/ coverage .nyc_output/

author: Pranav Avva
